column2: "Trɔma kwaa a asomdwee wɔ mu no oye Sen ofi a aponto ma na ntokwaa wɔ mu."
"Akowaa a ɔyɛ enyansadze no
column3: obedzi ɔba a ɔhyɛ enyito no do
column4: Na obenya enuanom mu egyapadze no bi."

column2: "Ogya na wɔdze sɔ sika na dwetɛ hwɛ
column3: Na akoma dze

column2: "Obusuyɛnyi tsie emumuyɛ ano: Na ɔtor yɛ aso ma mbusubɔ tɛkyerɛma."
"Obiara a osi ɔbɔbɔfo atwetwe no
column3: ogu Nyankopɔn a ɔbɔɔ no no n’enyim ase: Na nyia n’enyi gye amandze mu no

column2: "Nkɔdaa hɔn abɔtsir nye mba hɔn mba; Na mba hɔn enyimnyam nye hɔn egyanom."
"Abɔso no mmfata ɔkwasea: Na burburbur atorsɛm afata ɔdehye no."
"Mboabagye tse dɛ siar suman wɔ nyia ɔgye no nsamu: Mbrɛ ɔbɛdan biara no onya dza ɔrohwehwɛ no."
"Nyia ɔkata mbrato do no
column3: ɔhwehwɛ ɔdɔ: Na nyia otsi asɛm mu no dze

column2: "Nkaenyim tum nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee Sen ɔkwasea a ɔahwe no mbaa ɔha."
"Obusuyɛfo hwehwɛ etuatsew nko ara; Dɛm ntsi wobotu ɔbɔfo tsiɔdzennyi wɔ no do."
"Ma osisi a woewia ne mba nhyia obi mbom
column3: Nkyɛn ɔkwasea a no nkwaseasɛm aba."

column2: "Obiara a ɔdze bɔn hyɛ papa ananmu no
column3: Mbusu nnkɛpa ne fie ara da."

column2: "Mansotwe ahyɛse tse dɛ obi rutue nsu ano: Dɛm ntsi ansaana ɔrebɛyɛ ɔham no
column3: gyaa akasakasa no."

column2: "Nyia obu emumuyɛfo bem
column3: na nyia obu ɔtseneneenyi fɔ no
column4: EWURADZE n’ekyiwadze nye hɔn beenu nyina."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na sika kitsa ɔkwasea nsamu dɛ ɔdze rokɔtɔ nyansa
column3: Ber a onnyi ntseasee?"

column2: "Ɔnyɛnko dɔ aber nyinara
column3: Naaso onua dze

column2: "Nyimpa a onnyim nyansa no
column3: na odzi akagyinamu

column2: "Nyia ɔpɛ mbrato no
column3: ɔpɛ mansotwe: Nyia ɔma n’abowano kɔ sor ntrado no

column2: "Nyia ɔwɔ akoma kɔntɔnkye no
column3: onnya adze papa biara: Na nyia ɔwɔ tɛkyerɛma nkyeakyeae no

column2: "Nyia ɔwo ɔkwasea no
column3: ɔwo nya awerɛhow: Na enyigye bi nnyi hɔ ma ɔkwasea n’egya."

column2: "Enyigye akoma yɛ edur pa: Na sunsum bobɔe dze
column3: ɔwew mbiew mu."

column2: "Omumuyɛnyi gye nsumaa mu akyɛdze
column3: Dɛ ɔdze bɛdan atsɛmbu akwan enyi."

column2: "Nyansa wɔ nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee enyim: Na ɔkwasea enyiwa gu asaase ano."
"Ɔba kwasea yɛ n’egya ne yaw
column3: Na ɔbaa a ɔwoo no no bɔwen."

column2: "Eso onnye dɛ wɔbɛtsea ɔtseneneenyi
column3: Anaadɛ wɔbɔhwe ekunyin wɔ hɔn tɔɔtsenyɛ ho."

column2: "Nyia ɔkam ne nsɛm no
column3: ɔwɔ nyimdzee: Na nyia no sunsum dwe no

column2: "Ɔkwasea mpo
column3: sɛ omua n’ano a
